text.text: I am a frontend developer, building and designing apps and websites
text.textDepr: I am a multimedia designer, specializing in frontend development.

about.title: About
descText: I am a passionate and ambitious frontend developer, with a creative flair.

I work as a frontend developer at Wise Home, creating and developing apps, were I in a team of skilled developers, develop solutions to handle utility measurements for rental properties and creating distribution statements.

Frontend development contains the things I am most passionate about: Problem solving and creativity. I love being able to develop solutions to problems through coding, as well as learning and exploring the best possible ways to do it.
